meanings.definition: A member of a group of reptiles that includes mammals and their extinct relatives.
meanings.sent1: The synapsid was a reptile that eventually evolved into mammals.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the synapsid to learn more about the evolution of mammals.
meanings.sent3: The synapsid decided to throw a family reunion with all its extinct relatives.
meanings.sent4: The synapsid is like the long-lost cousin of modern mammals.
meanings.sent5: In the ancient forest, the synapsid roamed alongside its reptilian cousins.
